modName: Replace Shrouded Armor with Nightingale no ESP V2
summary:
Replace Shrouded with Nightingale V2 by UnrealRogue
Now with seperate textures
descriptionHtml:
This mod Will replace the Shrouded armor given to you after enter Dark BrotherHood first time.

V2 Update Note:
- New texture for the armor set, separate from Nightingale original textures
______________________________________________________________
Note:
-NO HOOD SUPPORT FOR FEMALE ( sorry guys, can\'t change the nif file to fit female\'s face, it remain the same everytime i try to change it)
-Same Stats as Shrouded Armor

Install:
- Unzip the file and put in Skyrim Folder

Uninstall:
- Go to The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor\\dbarmor and remove the dbarmor folder.

Credit:
- Bethesda
author: Unrealrogue
